languages.text: This creature gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} every time their ally dies. They also gain an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, but only once per ally.

traits.locale_text: This creature gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} every time their ally dies. They also gain an extra turn when an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, but only once per ally.

This creature gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} every time their ally dies. They also gain an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, but only once per ally.

languages.text: Это существо получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} каждый раз, когда один из его союзников погибает. Оно также получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} одного из союзников падает ниже 50%, но лишь один раз на союзника.
languages.original_text: This creature gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} every time their ally dies. They also gain an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, but only once per ally.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur erhält jedes Mal, wenn ein Verbündeter von ihr stirbt, einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}. Sie erhält außerdem einen Zusatzzug, wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} eines Verbündeten unter 50 % fallen, dies jedoch nur einmal pro Verbündetem.
languages.original_text: This creature gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} every time their ally dies. They also gain an extra turn when an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, but only once per ally.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur erhält jedes Mal, wenn ein Verbündeter von ihr stirbt, einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}. Sie erhält außerdem einen Zusatzzug, wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} eines Verbündeten unter 50 % fallen, dies jedoch nur einmal pro Verbündetem.

languages.text: Cette créature gagne un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} chaque fois que son allié meurt. Elle gagne également un tour supplémentaire lorsque les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} d'un allié passent sous les 50 %, mais une seule fois par allié.
languages.original_text: This creature gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} every time their ally dies. They also gain an extra turn when an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, but only once per ally.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature gagne un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} chaque fois que son allié meurt. Elle gagne également un tour supplémentaire lorsque les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} d'un allié passent sous les 50 %, mais une seule fois par allié.

languages.text: 每当盟友死亡时，此生物都会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。此外，当盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降低至50%以下时，此生物也会获得一个额外回合，但此效果每位盟友只能触发一次。
languages.original_text: This creature gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} every time their ally dies. They also gain an extra turn when an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, but only once per ally.

traits.locale_text: 每当盟友死亡时，此生物都会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。此外，当盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降低至50%以下时，此生物也会获得一个额外回合，但此效果每位盟友只能触发一次。

languages.text: Esta criatura gana un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} cada vez que su aliado muere. También gana un turno extra cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de un aliado caen por debajo del 50 %, pero solo una vez por aliado.
languages.original_text: This creature gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} every time their ally dies. They also gain an extra turn when an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, but only once per ally.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura gana un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} cada vez que su aliado muere. También gana un turno extra cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de un aliado caen por debajo del 50 %, pero solo una vez por aliado.

languages.text: このクリーチャーは、倒れた味方の数だけ{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加でターン{/g}数を獲得する。また、味方の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が50%を下回ると追加で1ターン獲得するが、これは味方1人につき1回のみ。
languages.original_text: This creature gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} every time their ally dies. They also gain an extra turn when an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, but only once per ally.

traits.locale_text: このクリーチャーは、倒れた味方の数だけ{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加でターン{/g}数を獲得する。また、味方の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が50%を下回ると追加で1ターン獲得するが、これは味方1人につき1回のみ。
